author: Rob Goldberg
title: Jazz's Joe Ingles Says He'd Walk Away from NBA to Protect His Son from COVID-19
description: Utah Jazz forward Joe Ingles would retire from the NBA if it meant protecting his son from the coronavirus.   As he explained on the  Tampering  podcast, his son Jacob, who is autistic, is more at risk to COVID-19 because of his weakened  immune system...
content:
Daniel Pockett/Getty Images
Utah Jazz forward Joe Ingles would retire from the NBA if it meant protecting his son from the coronavirus.
